title: Strategic Utilization of Mobile-Based Remote Language Education Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Design of mobile learning environments optimized for practicing professionals, emphasizing interaction enhancement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the qualitative reliability of language materials provided on mobile platforms with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform at least two feedback requests per week through synchronous/asynchronous interactions with instructors.
Learners can operate mobile interface functions (e.g., quiz submissions, voice recordings) with 90% utilization efficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
